Knowing when cursed/ Gameshark code for cursed?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Knowing when cursed/ Gameshark code for cursed?
By Zyborg on Tuesday, September 6, 2011 - 05:58 pm:

I was wondering, when would Holly let me know that
my monster is marked/cursed/haunted? After a battle,
during the tourney results, or when we get back to
the ranch? Does it have to be the monster's first
tourney, or could I keep fighting tourneys until
cursed? Finally, are there any codes that either
remove the requirement for getting a Ghost or
increase the chances of getting a monster cursed?

Thank you in advance.
